fileTooBig.Title: File too big
fileTooBig.Message1:
Files larger than 100mb could take a longer time to %s.
Would you still like to proceed?
fileTooBig.Message2:
Files larger than 1 Gigabyte will take several minutes to %s or will fail.
Would you still like to proceed?

abortedKeyGeneration.Title: Aborted Key Generation
abortedKeyGeneration.Message: Key generation aborted because you only tried to generate one key, but you need both!

noTextEntered.Title: No message to %s entered
noTextEntered.Message: You need to enter a message/filepath before you try to %s

noKeyEntered.Title: No %s entered
noKeyEntered.Message: You need to insert a %s before you try to %s

wrongKeyEntered.Title: Wrong %s entered
wrongKeyEntered.Message: This is the wrong %s to decrypt this message/file! Use the right Key!

keyNotFound.Title: Key not found
keyNotFound.Message:
The %s you tried to use does not exist!
Please use an existing Key!

UpdateAvailableTrue.Title: New version available
UpdateAvailableTrue.Message:
There's a new version available for download.
 Would you like to install it?

UpdateAvailableFalse.Title: No Update found
UpdateAvailableFalse.Message: You are currently running the newest version of this Software.

UpdateConnectionError.Title: Connection to server could not be established
UpdateConnectionError.Message:
Couldn't check for Updates,
Connection to GitHub couldn't be Established.
Please try again later or check if you are Connected to the Internet.

versionNotFound.Title: Version not found!
versionNotFound.Message:
The Software you are currently using doesn't have a Version registered to it,
please reinstall the Software.
If you have already done this,
Please open an issue and attach the log file of your current session.
GitHub: https://github.com/jasger9000/Cryptographer
Log file: %s

failedFileTooBig.Title: %s failed
failedFileTooBig.Message: The message/file couldn't be %s because it was too big!

failedFileType.Title: %s failed
failedFileType.Message: %s failed because the filetype isn't supported

fileNotFound.Title: File not found
fileNotFound.Message:
The file you would like to use was not found!
Please use an existing file!

unknownError.Title: Unknown Error
unknownError.Message:
An Unknown Error occurred.
Please open an issue and attach the log file of your current session.
GitHub: https://github.com/jasger9000/Cryptographer
Log file: %s

SettingsMenu.rememberKeyOptionTip:
If this option is enabled,
the last used key will be saved and loaded
each time the software is started.

window.indicatorTooltip:
Indicates if a key has been loaded.
Status: %s
